comments: When I purchased this for my friend's baby shower, there wasn't a clear area indicating I could leave a note/message to the expecting parents. Instead they informed me it arrived with no name or id of who sent it to them.SUggestion: Make the area off the registry bigger and bolder for the people purchasing it for a gift can leave a note.Thank you.

title: It's great
author: Amazon Customer
comments: I really enjoy this product works wonderfully I use it daily

title: Four Stars
author: Kiana Farokhpour
comments: A little too much given the fabric

title: Highly recommend for any mom out there who is expecting a ...
author: Amazon Customer
comments: The Boba wrap was the only way we got through the fussy stages of a newer baby. It also helped during growth spurts. I took baby everywhere in this! I was able to still get things done, while bonding with my baby. Highly recommend for any mom out there who is expecting a baby! It's amazing and worth every penny. Some people have mentioned to me that they couldn't figure out how to use it, it really is not hard to use once you figure it out, I got really fast at putting it on. I just watched a YouTube video a few times over, and I was a pro!

title: Love this wrap
author: Olivia Long
comments: Love this wrap ! got it as a baby shower gift. So perfect for when their itty bitty babies and you need to run a couple errands . No grubby stranger hands touch :)

title: Not easy to place baby in front of mom or on ...
author: Stephanie Hernandez
comments: Too large! Not easy to place baby in front of mom or on her hip side.

title: Loved this wrap when my son was an infant
author: Christina Mari
comments: Loved this wrap when my son was an infant. Made doing housework with him much easier. However it doesn't have much support so I stopped using it when he was around 15lbs because he started hurting my back. It's also very thick material so it gets warm pretty quick.

title: Is goos but my baby did not like, I guess it will depend on what work ...
author: Maydet Serrano
comments: Is goos but my baby did not like, I guess it will depend on what work for each baby.

title: Great product! We've used this almost daily since our ...
author: Laura C
comments: Great product! We've used this almost daily since our baby was born either to get work done around the house when baby wants to be held or as a way of getting baby to sleep. It does take a bit of getting used to tying it in the beginning but there's some great youtube videos to help with that. It's very stretchy material and find that the longer I wear it between washes, the stretchier it gets so just need to tie it tighter. I don't find it very good for going on walks as the material has so much give in it and baby bounces a lot so instead we use the Babybjorn Carrier One for that.

title: Higher Quality Than Others
author: Shannon Stacy
comments: We have a Tula for when our son gets older, but until he hits 15 lbs we needed something else to use. We originally ordered a different brand of wrap, but it ripped the first time we tried it due to an issue with the fabric. We returned it and ordered this one as it's replacement and I'm in love! We've been using it consistently for a month now. At first we weren't tying it tight enough and our son would slip down. We're pros now and no longer have that issue. I would recommend this wrap to ANYONE interested in wearing their infant. Our son loves it and it allows us to get basic errands and tasks done much more easily. The fabric is much higher quality (even though this one is $10 less than the first one we ordered), is soft enough for a newborn's skin, and is super comfortable for the parents.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Once I got used to it very comfortable

title: It's ok
author: Amazon Customer
comments: This is easy to use but REALLY warm.  I gave it 3 stars because it's OK.  Baby did feel secure when I put him in it, and he slept while in it, but we were both drenched in sweat after a while.  If your little one is born in the cold months, this would be ideal for you.

title: I dont' know what I would have done without it.
author: J. Campagna
comments: Life saver, not literally, but certainly a big help for my mental health.  My baby is generally a happy baby and does not cry as much as many other babies that I have come across.  That being said, the few times when he was an infant that he was crying uncontrollably and I had checked all the usual things (food, diaper, checked all digits to make sure one of my hairs hadn't wrapped around and cut off circulation, etc), I put him in the Boba wrap and he'd calm right down.Also, when you want to have them close, but you've got things to do, throw them in this thing and you're good to go.  I usually end up buying one of these as my go-to gift for new expecting moms.I'm not going to lie, I mostly put this on my registry because my husband and I are Star Wars fan and named our cat Boba; I just liked the name.  A former neighbor of mine got it for me and I don't know what I would have done without it.  I would recommend practicing putting it on several times before baby arrives.

title: Three Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Too complicated. I'm 4 foot 11 inches and this was a lot of fabric to use.

title: but overall I'm happy with it
author: Valerie R.
comments: It took awhile to get used to, but overall I'm happy with it.

title: Great buy, good for short walks or doing chores.
author: Soliman
comments: This is better than the K'tan wrap for me because I like to adjust it on my own instead of having a wrap that's pre-fit. It's one very long fabric and can look a little intimidating at first, but watch a couple YouTube videos and it's easily to do it yourself. In less than 5 minutes your LO will be inside and you'll be ready to go.  I just received it today and took my 3 week old out for an hour walk,  he didn't stir and looked very comfortable.  He was only in diapers because it's 79 degrees out. Comfort wise it's not the greatest back support so you're probably good for an hour before wanting to take it off and put him down.

title: Good quality product but not sure if my baby will take to it yet
author: Ashley Buff
comments: I have a 14 month old and a 2 month old so as hands-free as I can be makes my life a little easier. I purchased this a few weeks after my littlest one was born, hoping I could wear her throughout the day while attending to my toddler. It might just be me, but I had a hard time figuring out the wrap the first few times, and I just couldn't seem to get it tight enough. It also kept riding up in the back. Once I got her in it, she didn't seem comfortable and didn't take to it very well. It's also very warm so for the summer months it's not really ideal. I want to try it again in a couple of weeks and see if she will take to it better once she is a little older.

title: Love the concept
author: Kristina S
comments: Love the concept. Still have not perfected the wrap to make it comfortable for me and the baby. Have to keep practicing. Maybe watching some YouTube videos will help.

title: Great for bigger babies
author: SmithSki
comments: I like this product but it doesn't get tight enough for my preemie baby.

title: Hard to handle
author: Lee
comments: Hard to strep on each and every time, especially when you need to attend to a baby. Ruined my back. Wouldn't recommend!

title: Not the best wrap for the summer
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Not the best wrap for the summer, baby got too hot!! Now that she's almost 3 months and gained weight, it seems to weigh down. If you tighten it the baby doesn't like it.

title: it is great and my baby loves it
author: Nick C.
comments: Only downside to this wrap is it gets hot fast. Other than that, it is great and my baby loves it.

title: These are great!
author: Kathryn
comments: I bought this as a second wrap for me and my newest little one because she spits up more than my last and I love love love these things!!

title: but someone gave this to me when I had my daughter and I absolutely loved it. I lent mine to another friend when ...
author: Melissa
comments: I bought this for a friend, but someone gave this to me when I had my daughter and I absolutely loved it. I lent mine to another friend when my daughter grew out of it,  and she absolutely loves it! Share the love, pass it on! Worth every single penny.

title: Secure but hot
author: Callie
comments: So far my baby, husband, and I like it. Baby is comfortable and the wrap feels secure. Only downside is how thick the material is.

title: Five Stars
author: Rachel
comments: Love it! Great quality and great price.

title: Five Stars
author: Jessica Valentine
comments: Love this Boba Wrap. Gets a little hot after wearing it for a while.

title: Five Stars
author: bernadette broderick
comments: Love it

title: Three Stars
author: Tori
comments: You really have to practice and not get discouraged

title: Five Stars
author: Yovana Galvan
comments: Very comfortable for both the baby and me.

title: Five Stars
author: Sheila H
comments: Bought it for a friend and she loves it.

title: Great for plus size mom's
author: hetzie21
comments: So happy I gave baby wearing another try with this Boba. I was struggling to find a comfortable wrap for a plus size mom. I'm a dress size 18, and bra size 44D. The last wrap I bought squished my baby into my boobs. This wrap is comfortable for myself and my baby. She is currently 11 pounds and fits fine. Would recommend to anyone.

title: One Star
author: Carla Horta
comments: It was very difficult to wrap around and have my daughter in tight enough.

title: i use this wrap when going to restaurants because it is smaller and fits better in a seated position
author: Liz
comments: A little difficult for me to get the hang of wrapping this correctly. Looked on YouTube for instructions. i use this wrap when going to restaurants because it is smaller and fits better in a seated position, otherwise I prefer a more sturdy sling for the increased head support for my newborn.

title: This wrap stretched out so much with the first couple ...
author: Andrea
comments: This wrap stretched out so much with the first couple of uses that I could never quite get my daughter snug in it in the same way again. I don't use it anymore, just my Ergobaby carrier.

title: I don't like that when I am in the parking lot
author: arizona
comments: Only issue is it takes a minute to put on, not as fast as a slip on, obviously. Also, I don't like that when I am in the parking lot, putting on the go in the store, the length is so long, it lays on the parking lot ground until I get it wrapped all around me.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Love using this with my newborn!

title: Bad design
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Horrible design. You need 3 people just to help you put it on and get the baby in. I never felt like it was sturdy enough to let go of my baby.

title: Five Stars
author: Chany
comments: The best present for my sister and my new nephew...they will love it...the fabric is very soft and fresh.

title: Five Stars
author: Alyssa M.
comments: LOOOOOVE!!! I was concerned about being a plus size mom but it fits well and baby loves it!

title: Great wrap for little ones.
author: jesus martinez
comments: Great wrap, my 6 week old loves being picked up and this wrap helps me be hands free and I can have my little one on my chest. It holds him up great, and instructions are easy to follow. No more fussy baby!

title: I like the wrap and it's very easy to use
author: kristine
comments: I like the wrap and it's very easy to use. It's made from a high quality material but it's a warmer material that will be better for fall/winter. I don't think I'll use it on hotter days .

title: Love it.
author: Amazon Customer
comments: I bought another brand of wrap, and it wouldn't fit, and I'm only a size 16 post pregnancy.  I ordered the boba wrap after reading a review saying it fit a size 24. I Love the boba wrap! It fits and I love how I can move around the hose while snuggling my little boy. It's my favorite baby accessory.

title: I had a hard time getting it on comfortably. I don't like using it for my newborn
author: Amazon Customer
comments: I had a hard time getting it on comfortably. I don't like using it for my newborn, hopefully I will get more use out of it when she is a little older.

title: Sweat
author: DL
comments: I don't know what this is made of but I'm taking it with me to Antarctica. The material is insanely hot, impossible to wear over any clothing (also because it will bunch up severely while you are putting this on). It will soothe a fussy infant but make a hungry one angry since it presses their rooting face into your chest. Instructions and official Boba video are badly done but there are plenty of YouTube examples of how to put this on and get a baby inside. Do not expect to wear it for more than 15-30 min without back pain.

title: Two Stars
author: Kim W
comments: Hot, hard to tie, baby wasn't having it.  Just my personal experience.

title: Not safe for a baby!
author: Jennifer Mueller
comments: Did not Like and do not think it is safe for baby. I don't how tight I had to tie wrap but after several attempts baby just dropped down inside...was not secure. Better off purchasing a ring sling or even a carrier. I ended up purchasing a baby Bjorn carrier and happy with my purchase. The whole wrap idea isn't for me!

title: Easy to follow instructions
author: Sherrice Miles
comments: Easy to follow instructions.  The Boba wrap is comfortable and soothing for my 2 month old son. It allows me to hold him close while I shop, go for walks, eat, etc. My baby loves it. While we are out and about my son is either asleep in it or quietly taking in the scenery.

title: Although this wrap is long it is very easy to tie
author: Alicia Jo DeOtto
comments: Although this wrap is long it is very easy to tie....this is the only thing that keeps my baby happy as she likes to be held all the time and it keeps my hands free!

title: One Star
author: rob
comments: Not easy to wear, especially not when you have to wrap it by yourself. Would not recommend.

title: Easy & Hands-free Carrier
author: Amy Smith
comments: I purchased as a gift for my daughter and her newborn.  They love it!

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Love this wrap. It's nice for a growing baby. Super comfortable and easy to do.

title: This is an amazing wrap- well worth the money
author: Shane Wright
comments: This is an amazing wrap- well worth the money! My son has horrible reflux and has to be held upright almost around the clock to soothe him- it was killing my back and shoulders- this wrap TOTALLY helps! And being held snug on my chest soothes him almost immediately! Which is silent music to my ears! I recommend it to anyone who's up at all hours of the night dancing a fussy baby!!

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Used as a gift with rave reviews.

title: Worked better with a newborn
author: Amazon Customer
comments: I have a lot of different wraps and carriers. This was one of my favorites when my son was first born. It's very comfortable to wear and pretty easy to put on. However, I've had a lot of trouble using it as he's gotten older and stronger. He was 7 months the last time I used it and it just felt so insecure. The material is very stretchy and he's strong enough to wiggle around and bend backwards- it kept feeling like he was going to fall out. I may be doing something wrong, but I tied it as tight as I could. I am rather small though- 5'5" 120 lbs.

title: Bought this thinking I would love it. It was very warm and I had ...
author: Shera C.
comments: Bought this thinking I would love it.  It was very warm and I had baby girl in it for just a few seconds.  It's also a little tricky to figure out.

title: Too much effort so-so results...
author: Jena Lea
comments: I didn't care for this at all. I have had less than a handful of successful wearings with this wrap. If you do manage to get it done up correctly and the baby in correctly it doesn't take long before it starts sagging anyway. I bought it to wear my baby around the house, but also out and about... what I didn't consider is that the wrap will be all over the sidewalk/parking lot/ground in the process on getting it on. No thanks. I did much better with the soft structured carriers.

title: calm and comfortable. The shipment arrived quickly
author: Cheryl Steven
comments: I purchased this for my friend's baby for her baby shower.  She loves it and so does the baby!  She says it keeps the baby close, calm and comfortable.  The shipment arrived quickly!

title: Cool, breathable
author: BaykeandLaura
comments: Cool, breathable, a little difficult to learn to use, getting a bigger baby in and out takes practice but overall a nice carrier for regular use.

title: Take anywhere, baby loves it. Sangria is more magenta than red.
author: Marie
comments: Baby loves this! It's fairly easy to put on.  A structured carrier with clasps might be easier to take on and off, but this is cozy and fits super easily into it's carrying pouch, making it easy to take anywhere. I use it frequently at the grocery store to leave room in the cart for groceries instead of a bulky car seat. One note - the sangria is more of a magenta.

title: Good for those babies who need to be held all the time
author: robert j.
comments: My wife liked this. The only con: it's a hassle to put it on, so if your baby is really fussy it will be hard to calm it down if takes you forever to wrap this around your body. She practiced many times before wearing it to run errands. She just can't figure it out how to breastfeed on it.

title: Five Stars
author: Narda Dixon
comments: I'm selecting 5 stars for now.  Baby hasn't come yet so it hasn't been used.  Will update.

title: It's way too long and not appropriate for summer.
author: Amazon Customer
comments: It's  way too long and not appropriate for summer.

title: The Boba Baby Wrap was a waste of money
author: bookworm
comments: The Boba Baby Wrap was a waste of money. Baby products are supposed to make a parent's life easier but this wrap did not. After you wrap this around your body, following the directions, you have to lift your baby inside. Well, if you're petite or your baby isn't able to hold his head up yet, it's very difficult. So, I tried lying on my couch with my baby against my chest and wrap him. That, too, was difficult.  And my baby started sagging as soon as I stood up. Maybe I didn't wrap him tight enough. The stretchy, soft fabric is gentle next to my baby and that is why this product gets a 1-star rating.

title: Love it
author: Hellokayzee
comments: I like how easy it is to put this on and go. I actually put it on before I leave the house so when I get to where I need to go I'm not trying to put in on in the car. I was gonna give it 5 stars but, I don't like how thick it is. This would be great for winter baby's but not summer. Prepare to sweat! But it is nice! And super cute!

title: Returned for something else.
author: J. Simpson
comments: Difficult to get a good fit, either too tight or too loose.Couldn't use while out due to fabric coming in contact with the ground.In our Arizona climate we just got too hot, even in the cooler months.

title: Wonderful for Newborns! Highly Recommend!
author: Nia
comments: I love my boba wrap so much- I bought a second one to keep at my mom's house when we are there once a week! My little one loves it and it's perfect for her fussy time in the evening when she just wants to be held but I need to be getting my 5 year old ready for bed, cleaning up dinner, getting things out for the next day, etc. I highly recommend this wrap for newborn and up- my little one is 11 lbs now at 2 months and still enjoys the wrap.

title: It is great! I used it at the museum and baby ...
author: Linda D.
comments: It is great!  I used it at the museum and baby slept the whole time.  My only Comment is that it is extremely long and drops all over the floor when I put it on so if I'm in public I'm getting it very dirty before wrapping it around myself.  Also I think enclosing a video demonstration in the box would be good.  I had to search YouTube for one and I think it should come with a link or something.  Also I would love to be able to use this when baby is older and wants to face forward.  So I'm a bit disappointed I will grow out of it so soon.

title: Five Stars
author: Leanne
comments: Love it!.....

title: she's comfortable. We have the Lillebaby carrier as well but ...
author: Rmu
comments: My newborn daughter and I go for walks daily with her all wrapped and cozy in this. It gets a little warm in 80 degree weather but if I put her on just a short sleeve onesie, she's comfortable. We have the Lillebaby carrier as well but my daughter seems to be more comfortable in the Boba wrap. I think she likes the soft fabric. I thought it will be a challenge to learn to wrap it around me and at the same time making sure my baby girl is safe and secure but I watched a couple of YouTube videos and it was actually very easy. Not only do we use this on our walks, but also around the house. I carry my baby all the time. I could do laundry, vacuum and wash dishes and still get to be close to my baby girl. Highly recommend to moms who are looking at carrying their babies all the time.

title: My baby loved it!
author: Fatima Hashmi
comments: This wrap is really amazing, my very picky baby really likes it!! I'm so glad I brought it. It's a little difficult but watch couple of YouTube and you'll learn how to wear it

title: Five Stars
author: KLWSHOPPER
comments: A MUST HAVE, COMES IN HANDY!

title: Disappointed
author: Alicia M.
comments: I wanted to like this SOO much. But alas, I hated it. I registered for two of these for my shower, and received two. I would up returning one and keeping one.Positives:1. Keeps babe warm in the wintertime outdoor expeditions.2. Stretchy3. Stretchiness allows for head support and a makeshift hatNegatives:1. So long!!! It's like it's made for a morbidly obese person who's in to baby wearing!!!! I'm no skinny mini (size 10-12-14) and there is so much extra fabric on this that I wrap it around my waist TWICE!! You MUST drop it on the ground to get it on. If you're using this in public, it'll be on the germy  ground of the parking lot, food store, airport, or wherever else you're planning to use it.2. Hot as hell. Prepare to sweat.3. No safe forward facing holds. Inward  facing ONLY. My babe loves to look at things, and while he does love my boobs, it's good to let him see other stuff too haha4. Due to the dropping on the floor issue, I'd wrap myself in this prior to leaving the house. If my husband or whoever stays in the car w our son, and I run into  a store quickly, I look like a loon wearing this sans baby.I ended up keeping one for winter, and I got the baby ktan active for spring and summer wear, or when I plan to take it off

title: A gift for my niece
author: Lois
comments: I bought this as a gift. I will update as soon as I hear from the recipient.

title: Way too complicated for every use
author: AAA
comments: Who has time to figure this thing out with a baby?! I spent as long as I could trying to put this on then baby started crying and I just packed it right back up and sent it back. I wouldn't recommend this for those who don't have a great deal of patience !!

title: My son loves being in the Boba wrap! I ...
author: Kristi
comments: My son loves being in the Boba wrap! I ordered this when my son was 2 weeks old and it gave me my hands back! He will hang out in the wrap while I get a few things done at home or while we're out running errands. He naps in it really well too.

title: Egh...
author: JM
comments: Not my favorite- it is just a large piece of fabric. I was expecting it to be a little more.

title: Easy to put baby and baby loves it
author: Kaye S
comments: I had high expectations on this product being a moby wrap user 5 years ago with my first son . So bec of the great reviews i really thought it is a better product but because of the stretchy fabric , my second baby who is two months old now goes down low no matter how tight and how high i put him in the wrap . This results with my back aching .I do love the ease of putting the baby on and my baby loves it once he is in . Over all i wouldnt recommend it to a friend . But for use around the house this is nice because its easy to put on .

title: Five Stars
author: Tamai
comments: my baby loves it

title: I love it and baby loves it as well
author: zoie tesheira
comments: I love it and baby loves it as well. He falls asleep every time i wear him.  Only 4 stars because it's soo long it takes a while to wrap and sometimes it's not as tight. Other than that,  it's great

title: no complaints
author: Sam
comments: Product seems to doing its purpose, have not had any complaints yet but will keep updated. Item is used on a daily base, so hoping all goes well.

title: My newborn loves it!
author: Cassie Mortensen
comments: This was such a great purchase! My newborn loves it and I wear it all the time! I would recommend it to anyone who wants to try baby wearing! The only problem is the fabric is esky thick and it gets hot.

title: For a friend
author: Ernie Evans
comments: We did not buy this for us we got it for a friend off of her list and we had suggested it for her. We have three kids and with two of them we have Bobaed .. if that is a verb ...We love them or more specifically my wife does she would not go anywhere with out it on and if she didn't have it there would be a melt down because of the loss of mobility from one of us. great product for a great price.

title: Mom of 2 under 2
author: Cassidy
comments: I'm a mom of two under two and bought the Boba wrap to help me keep my sanity. This stretch carrier allows me to chase around my 14 month old all while keeping my newborn close. I've had the wrap for about 2 weeks now and have used it everyday and have used it for both children. My newborn slides in perfectly and loves being so close all the time, and my toddler fits comfortably in it, however because he is so wiggly and loves to look/face forward, I will use a different carrier for him. The material feels like a comfortable tee shirt, but you wrap it around yourself three times so it can get very warm for you and baby if you don't dress and plan for wearing it. It advocates ease of breastfeeding and i have seen women feed in it, however as a bigger busted woman i am finding it difficult to do so. Overall it was a great purchase and i wish i had bought one for my first baby.

title: Awesome, but Complicated
author: EC3U
comments: I wanted this instead of a carrier that separated my child's legs. This is a great product, but in all honesty, it's a bit complicated. I've had mine for a while now & im still trying to master the "technique". My infant loves it & almost instantly falls asleep once inside, so it's worth it.

title: Love my boba!
author: Adrienne
comments: I love my boba wrap! The baby fits well and it is simple enough to tie. If I am out and about I wrap it up in the car then adjust so it doesn't rub on the ground. If you live in a hot climate I'm not sure it would be the best as baby sweats when it is warm. But my boba saved my life and I get lots of compliments on it too

title: Probably a new use!
author: MaryJo
comments: I used the Boba to carry my puppy Amber around the airport and keep her close in the cabin. She is a certified emotional support dog and can sit with me. I am very petite and found the Boba somewhat cumbersome and difficult to get tight enough to hold the puppy as securely as I would have liked. It was not my color of choice as the color I wanted was out of stock. The Sangria color was still pretty though and looked nice with my Golden Retriever! People at the airport loved the idea and even asked for pictures. I have chronic back pain and this went around me enough times to give my back lots of support!

title: I cannot say enough good things!
author: J. Gee
comments: I bought the Boba back when my son was a newborn and he would cry whenever I put him down. I had an Ergobaby, as great and comfortable it is, my son's head kept flopping forward; I hunched over to prevent that from happening and it hurt my back.  I started looking for alternatives and found the Boba. I had gone with a structured carrier when I was pregnant because I thought wraps, slings and mei tais did not look secure at all--what if I dropped my baby?? I bought one because I my house was a mess and I was desperate. I was still pretty skeptical when I open the box and found a really long piece of cloth. I followed the instructions and tied it and put my son in, and he fell asleep.  Four months later, I still reach for it instead of my Ergobaby. Yes, it's a little more work to tie it on. But we are both so comfortable!  It's a lifesaver, especially on night was the last: his got his shots and has been cranky. I am so grateful I found this wrap!  A must for any parents of newborns who are planning to wear baby!

title: This wrap is pretty good! However
author: Eric Miller
comments: This wrap is pretty good! However, my month old gets pretty hot in it. Also he sinks down into it after awhile.

title: Five Stars
author: Kaileigh Wing
comments: Love this wrap it is very comfy and has a good amount of stretch to it.

title: Love it!
author: Kindle Customer
comments: I just got the Boba and I love it. I have a Moby also but it just doesn't stretch which is good for a new born, but my son is four months old and much prefers this wrap that has a little give so he doesn't feel trapped. To wear I feel like it is much more comfortable too.

title: Amazing
author: Amazon Customer
comments: This wrap is amazing. I love it. It is soft and the material is strong. The baby is extremely comfortable. I have recommended this wrap to many mothers.

title: It stretches out after 5min and I feel like my baby is going to fall so stopped using ...
author: ilona
comments: It stretches out after 5min and I feel like my baby is going to fall so stopped using it and cannot return it as tried to use it. Very disappointing with this product. Waste of my $$!!!

title: Great buy!
author: Stacey Ann
comments: I purchased this wrap in grey for my sister and her baby and she absolutely loves it! Great buy!!

title: Too much material
author: R
comments: I hoped this wrap would work for me, but the wrapping process is too complicated and the deal breaker was the enormous amount of cloth/material. WAY too much for me to deal with, so I returned it.

title: I like it. But I just don't find it comfortable ...
author: E
comments: I like it. But I just don't find it comfortable no matter how I've tried to wear it with my baby. He doesn't seem comfortable. I'm a really small person and there is tons of fabric left over. I guess it works well for some people but I don't find it works for me.

title: Five Stars
author: D Listenbee
comments: This product was a gift, and the mother absolutely loves it for her little one!

title: Four Stars
author: Jennifer Jensen
comments: I love it! It's a little warm for outside but perfect around the house.

title: Love these wraps!
author: Deana M.
comments: Personally, I love these things, and think that every new mom should have one (and perhaps a spare)! They're easy to use once you get the hang of it, and they feel more secure than the backpacks that use straps and clips. I bought this for my stepmom, and she didn't like it, but I think that was for her own weird reasons, so we ended up returning it, but it isn't a reflection of the wrap. Buy it! They're awesome!

title: Great product!
author: Cathy Hornback
comments: It's stretchy but sturdy. Very comfy and works well!

title: Three Stars
author: Regeana Cashion
comments: Gave as a gift....

title: In Love with this item
author: Karito
comments: This item exceed my expectations,  I was not planning to buy any baby carriers ,but after reading the review's,  I decided to purchase it and I am glad I did it!

title: Five Stars
author: Tanya Houseal
comments: Perfect. This product is exactly what we needed to manage a newborn and toddler. She loves it

title: So glad this product is available
author: D Link
comments: Purchased this for my daughter (first time Mom) and she says it has saved her life....So glad this product is available.

title: Five Stars
author: Mayra
comments: Love it!

title: Overall great quality!
author: Amanda A
comments: The only problem with this buy was that it came with no instructions! Lol! I had to you tube on how to use this thing! Haha! Overall great quality!

title: We absolutely love our Boba wrap
author: Jessica B
comments: We absolutely love our Boba wrap! Our little one was born early, so he was on the small side. He fit perfectly in it with no worries of him falling out. I love that you can tighten it to fit even the smallest babies. I would highly recommend the Boba!!

title: Might like better when baby is bigger
author: outofstep2609
comments: Might like better when baby is bigger, but not while he is under 1 month old. I was hoping it would be more hands free, but wrap slides down a lot. Also putting it on is a hassle.

title: This is a brilliant invention. Super
author: Aubrie George
comments: This is a brilliant invention. Super, super easy to use and very convenient to have free hands while baby is nicely snug and safely secure. My son falls asleep almost instantly when I get him wrapped up and stays calmly asleep for pretty much the entire time he's in. I absolutely recommend this, especially for moms like me who like to remain efficient and get out and about while baby sleeps. I just wish I'd had this for my first baby, too!

title: Baby wrap
author: IRENE BOUCHARD
comments: Excellent product,,my granddaughter loves it

title: Awesome product
author: Emily
comments: We have a 6 week old son who has been dealing with a slight case of colic for the last few weeks. Having a 2 year old daughter this made evenings extremely difficult to manage anything. I never saw myself as the type to use something like this but wish I had had this with our daughter. It is a lifesaver! To cook dinner, soothe or anytime you just need a hand free. My only complaints would be I had to wash it because of the amount of spitup/vomit we deal with and it gets  hot after wearing awhile and it didn't look as nice after one washing.

title: This wrap was a MUST this time around since I ...
author: Noel Taylor
comments: This wrap was a MUST this time around since I have a toddler and a newborn. Couldn't have survived the first few weeks without it!!

title: Five Stars
author: Natalie baenziger
comments: I LOVE my boba wrap. Super soft! And the pattern is super cute too!

title: seems comfortable on a flat surface for the baby Cons
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Pros: seems comfortable on a flat surface for the babyCons: my daughter seems to sweat so much with this pillow, and it snags her hair awkwardly.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Great baby shower gift

title: Five Stars
author: GEX
comments: Great design, i like it.

title: THANK YOU, BOBA BABY WRAP!!
author: Elemenopey
comments: I purchased my boba from Target (same price as Amazon) but it has been a life saver! My baby wouldn't nap during the day and was up for 8+ hours/day at 2 weeks old. Needless to say we were all exhausted!! I bought a boba because I was at my wits end - nothing would help her nap! We couldn't hold her or put her down or put her in a swing. I put my baby in my boba and she napped for 3 hours! I wore her every day for the first 3 months and she napped and was the best baby! Now she naps in a swing during the day.We couldn't have made it through the first 3 months without this.

title: This wrap works great! I bought it for my second baby
author: Farmwife
comments: This wrap works great! I bought it for my second baby, so that I could have the baby with while chasing around my first born. It's super easy to use and only takes a minute to put on.

title: Great product.
author: rm
comments: Awesome for preemies! I loved having it for when I needed my hands free. Material is soft and luxurious. Machine washable!Eventually I personally needed more support for my shoulders and back so I bought a Lillebaby but I am forever thankful for this wrap.Wraps are crazy long and can't be thrown on super fast when baby is upset (maybe they can and I am just not skilled in fast wrapping ways).

title: Great wrap!
author: Alyssa
comments: I absolutely love this wrap and so does my daughter. I take it everywhere we go. It has helped me to keep up with my 2.5 year old and with doing household things. Soft and stretchy. Not to mention pretty color.

title: Five Stars
author: LGS
comments: Great baby wrap - use it all the time!

title: After several YouTube tutorials, I still can't figure it ...
author: Mimi Mullin
comments: After several YouTube tutorials, I still can't figure it out. I must be severely sleep deprived! We are sticking with the baby Bjorn.

title: Great but hot
author: Addie Vasquez
comments: It's a very nice and stretchy fabric with just enough give to not squeeze you to death. My daughter is 2 weeks old and weighs about 7 pounds and fits great. The only problem I had with it is that she and I are both hot people and it seemed to get hot really fast. She turned red she got so hot and I was sweating lol. It would be great for outdoor wear in the summer but I don't think she and I will go outside in south louisiana with it.  I do however still plan to use it while cleaning the house.

title: Five Stars
author: Leah Starnes
comments: LOVe this thing! Best baby purchase by far

title: Stinks for summer weather and bigger babies
author: Bauer
comments: Not the greatest for a bigger baby. Material is super stretchy so my 14 pound baby seemed to sag lower and lower no matter how tight I wrapped.. I didn't feel it was secure unless I had my hand under his bottom which kinda defeated the purpose. I ordered the black one and it picked up/showed every single piece of lint/hair that was floating around. Material is super thick so this is awful for hot summer days, we bother got sticky and sweaty using this.We prefer the cheaper infantino carrier over this one which was double the price of the infantino

title: Wonderful
author: Brian Steel
comments: This wrap is so comfortable and easy to use!

title: Wife likes it, but a little more complicated to ...
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Wife likes it, but a little more complicated to figure out than it looks. Baby enjoys it. Read the directions a couple of times.

title: Do you just like kissing your sweet baby's head after they charm strangers ...
author: Laura Maio
comments: This wrap will change your life. I have become evangelical about it -- literally wrapping babies in the middle of Target. I have directly sold 3. My elaborate explanations at the library, Trader Joes, Shoprite, the doctor's office -- have had women on their phones ordering them.Think of scenarios in which you need both hands? Oh, ALL OF THEM? That awkward kettlebell of an infant carrier doesn't fit ANYWHERE outside of the house (yeah, stick it in the cart and jam some food around the kid) and hurts every part of your body?Do you feel insane trying to cross a street with your stroller because you have to drag it behind you at every corner to look for traffic?Do you just like kissing your sweet baby's head after they charm strangers with their incredible head control? TUMMY TIME WITHOUT TEARS!Do you want to travel to FL for a week with a carryon suitcase and a backpack? (Yes. We did.)Wrap those cute little nuggets my friends and celebrate your freedom!

title: Great idea! No more lost binkies
author: Ryan D. Austin
comments: Great idea! No more lost binkies! Sometimes the baby will throw it though. Lol. Over all a really great product.

title: I felt like I was squashing her every time I tried and ...
author: Sparkles
comments: The fabric is very thick and I found it really difficult to make this work for me and my baby. I felt like I was squashing her every time I tried and she would cry the whole time because it's not easy to just set her in. I ended up buying a carrier instead and it worked better for us.

title: Good
author: honest
comments: Bought for my granddaughter. She uses the wrap a lot. Says it helps her get things done around the house. Only complaint is that it gets hot wearing it

title: Works like a charm
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Works like a charm.  Baby doesn't cry and now you have free hands.  Perfect for when you're home my yourself with the baby.

title: Four Stars
author: Diana Redman
comments: Takes a long time to get on

title: Baby hated it.
author: Frank White
comments: Lol. I didn't mind the process of wrapping it, but baby did not like going in! My child is temperamental tho. Totally wasted $40. See if you can try different carriers and find out what baby likes too.I found learning to wrap it easy thanks to YouTube (my go to) but a bit of an inconvenience/process. Also it's a LOT of fabric and gets really hot. My baby was maybe going on 3 months and is big so he could've been too big for this by then. I really wanted to make it work and tried a few times, he rejected it every time except the first time which he actually fell asleep in it (did I mention this thing gets hot!). Maybe next baby will like it.

title: Ergo baby works much better for us
author: lisa pierson
comments: It's hard to get baby into this by myself and even then the baby feels awkward. Baby hates this thing and so do I. Ergo baby works much better for us.

title: I love this wrap
author: Leah M.
comments: I love this wrap.  Good quality and wonderful way to cuddle.  I like that it can accommodate your baby as they grow in various ways.

title: ... for wearing around the house that allowed me to comfortably sit down as well
author: Danielle
comments: I wanted something lightweight for wearing around the house that allowed me to comfortably sit down as well. This wrap was perfect and my little one loves it!

title: Baby Shower
author: Kayla White
comments: Bought as a gift for a baby shower. Arrived on time as expected. Mother said she is excited to use!

title: It's good but too hot.
author: Carolina
comments: Unless you live somewhere where it's really cold I don't recommend.

title: Five Stars
author: Katey Bogner
comments: Great price and product! Jusr what I was looking for!

title: feel hot
author: Amazon Customer
comments: feel hot

title: I absolutely love the boba
author: Chelsie
comments: I absolutely love the boba! The instructions are very easy to read. As soon as I place my daughter in it she falls right to sleep.

title: Every mom should baby wear!!
author: Shelby
comments: Love my boba wrap! Every mom should get a wrap or carrier. Boba has great quality products and my son is always happy in the wrap!!

title: Nice wrap
author: SuziM
comments: I sometimes babysit my 10 month old niece and use this to take her for walks. It's very comfortable and she also enjoys the ride. It might be too warm in summertime though.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Everything as described. 5 stars!

title: Heavenly wrap
author: Jo
comments: Such a necessary wrap that all moms should own!

title: I did not like it for running errands or for any prolonged walking
author: Sharon
comments: This wrap works well while the babies are small. As they got heavier, I found the stretchy fabric to be too stretchy and didn't hold the babies well. As they got older, I would use this wrap while wearing them around the house if they were fussy. However, I did not like it for running errands or for any prolonged walking.

title: Two Stars
author: Shawn
comments: Was cute but hot for me due to being wrapped in a thick sweatshirt type material.

title: Baby's favorite carrier.
author: B.R.
comments: We used this daily for walks, naps, etc. Easy to use and very comfy for little babies.

title: Not as good as the Moby
author: marta
comments: The material is stretchy so you need to tie it very tight on your body before putting in the baby, otherwise baby will sink too low and is too jiggly and loose. Excess fabric is so long it almost drags on the ground. The only upside is that it's easier to take baby out without waking him because of the stretchy material. We prefer the Moby over this and only use the Boba when the Moby is in the wash.

title: High quality material, but wrap is WAY too long ...
author: Bentoken
comments: High quality material, but wrap is WAY too long for me! I'm 4'11 and I seriously get tangled when trying to put it on. Wish it were a bit shorter or at last came in different sizes. It's a pain to put on quickly when you're getting all tangled. Once on and baby is in, she likes it about half the time.

title: Four Stars
author: sp
comments: I think this is too warm for hotter weather

title: Five Stars
author: Ava H.
comments: LOVE IT! So easy and comfy. My baby loves being so cozy and close to me.

title: Gift. I don't know.
author: Janice Moody
comments: Gift.  I don't know.

title: Excellent product
author: Genevieve
comments: Soft stretchy material. Very supportive. Great for my newborn who doesn't want to be put down when I have things to do. I imagine this will continue to be useful as he gets older.

title: Recommended
author: Juan C.
comments: As the description

title: ILOVEIT
author: Amerika
comments: I love it i couldn't be more in love with this product I can do so much while I have my baby close to me I can carry my toddler as well and my baby she loves this

title: Boba Baby Wrap
author: Kindle Customer557
comments: I gave this to my niece at her baby shower.  She said she loves it!

title: I recommend to everyone!
author: Alicia
comments: I absolutely love the Boba Wraps. I prefer them over Moby, they are comfortable for baby and mom. I have given these as shower gifts to several friends and they love it. It's easy to roll up, doesn't take up alot of space, multiple colors to choose from and best of all their customer service is fantastic!

title: A must have!
author: Nicole Lombardi
comments: Love it! I have 3 boys, the newest one is the first I've used with the Boba. We absolutely cannot live w out it. I'm able to snug the baby, while I am hands free to help the other 2! I've vacuumed, made beds & even made sauce & meatballs while wearing my babe!

title: Not for me
author: KH
comments: I purchased it based on great reviews.... unfortunately my son didn't like it. Not sure whether it's safe to use because it's very unseeable when I placed him inside.... I don't want to drop my boy and I decided not to use it further.  As I already washed and couldn't return... So i will give it to my friend who is interested in adopting it.

title: Not for me!
author: Aundrea
comments: I personally didn't like it and shipped it back! It was too difficult to put on, unless you stayed at home.

title: Use it each day
author: Dana L. Thayer
comments: I use this thing everyday with my newborn. Often she wants the comfort of being close and this allows me to still get things done around the house or make things more manageable on the go. Tying it on is hard to get used to at first but there are youtube videos that help a lot. Would highly recommend!

title: Four Stars
author: Potss
comments: Hard to adjust but works pretty well once adjusted.

title: Four Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Fine, the medium size is very big, the color is more darker.

title: Five Stars
author: Denise
comments: Perfect!

title: wrap inferno
author: Rachael A
comments: The wrap is very heavy and gets very hot. Most the time I would have to put baby in with just a diaper or onesie on and we would still be sweaty just moving around the house. I also wasn't a fan of the extremely long tail. Being a thin, fit person having this much fabric was uncomfortably heavy, distracting and cumbersome. I could only wear a t-shirt or tank top beneath it and it was impossible to put anything over the top of it when we went outside.It is great for learning to properly wrap- with it's thickness and weight, it makes it easy to figure out the correct pass throughs but after a few wears I switched over to another brand with a much more lightweight, softer Lenzing modal fabric.

title: Love. Love
author: D1
comments: Love. Love. Love. This is great! Easy to put on after the first few times (YouTube helped with learning the technique to tie it). It has been winter so the baby being cuddled and warm has been fine. No summer use yet but not sure it will happen since it does tend to get warm.

title: Five Stars
author: Aubrea
comments: Absolutely love! So easy to use and comfortable

title: Secure and snug
author: Diana M. Schumann
comments: My baby loves being wrapped snuggly in this wrap! I love being able to carry her hands-free as well. It's a very long piece of cloth, and is very comfortable once on. The instructions that come with it show a few different ways to wrap based on baby's size/weight which is great, you will definitely get a good amount of time's worth out of this. Baby feels very secure in it, and she actually usually just falls right to sleep! I am tempted to get more in more colors because this wrap works so well! Love the Boba Wrap!

title: Nice fabric, easy-ish once you get the hang of it.
author: Ciro izarra
comments: A little complicated to use but surely will get easier one we get the hang of it. Good stuff, though. Nice fabric and loved the color. The wife likes it a lot. We've both used it (she's thin, I'm fat) and it adjusts well.

title: Five Stars
author: Marielle D
comments: It's super easy to use and baby loves it.

title: Soothes baby instantly, comfortable and secure
author: Rachel Hahn
comments: I have previously tried the ergo baby Carrier and the ktan and this boba wrap seems to work far better for the first few months. It is fairly easy to put on after watching an instructional video, is comfortable to wear and works for both me and my husband even though we are very different sizes. The ktan didn't stay tight enough to my body so baby would sag. That's not a problem at all with the boba wrap. The ergobaby worked well for my son when he was a bit older and could support his head well and was a bit taller but is difficult to put a young baby and didn't seem to keep them as comfortable and secure. Baby loves to be close to us and soothes as soon as we put her in the boba wrap.

title: Stay away; look elsewhere
author: Matthew
comments: Product was difficult to use It took both my wife and myself to use it, but even then we still couldn't get it right enough to support our baby. Material was too stretchy and unsupportive. Returned and purchased a different wrap

title: Five Stars
author: Susan Sahadevan
comments: It was a gift so I hope so!

title: Five Stars
author: Krystal Antwine
comments: Nice and comfy for baby

title: Such a great wrap! My baby loves being carried in it
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Such a great wrap! My baby loves being carried in it. At first I thought it was be hard to put on but it's not at all! Very comfortable to wear and I feel like my baby is safe when she's in it.

title: I really like this wrap
author: Amazon Customer
comments: I really like this wrap. The back support is amazing. The only thing is that my little one does get hot because of the material.

title: Three Stars
author: Lel A.
comments: Too hot and too long.

title: I absolutely love this wrap
author: Emily N Cline
comments: I absolutely love this wrap! I watched a video to learn how to tie it and since then I've used it everyday. It's very sturdy and nice material.

title: Five Stars
author: Lacy M Tate
comments: Love it

title: Three Stars
author: MK
comments: Not entirely easy to put on.

title: Baby wrap
author: Amerika
comments: BOBA wrap is amazing I love it my daughter loves it. I can carry her anywhere she positions herself basically she still feels in the womb. I love it I def recommend it for anyone having a newborn allows me to do anything while Im at home such as chores and other stuff while she's in the wrap. I carry her while I carry my 1 year old with no worry she might fall it's supper easy to put on I mean if u know how to tie your laces u can wrap this up its supper easy .

title: Love it, just longer then I thought)
author: Anastasia
comments: Love it , just longer then I thought)

title: Five Stars
author: A
comments: Such a great product and a life saver with a new baby!!

title: Wonderful!!!
author: Janeth Quizhpi
comments: Loved it... is was as if my newborn was still in the womb. Took her on a 10 hr trip, and even breastfed her.. while she was wrapped. It worked out perfectly, she was comfy and I so was I..

title: Love this wrap.
author: JC
comments: Daughter is 4.5 months and still uses this.  Very soft and easy to tie.

title: Nice for newborns...
author: Trashby
comments: This was nice when our son was a newborn. My husband would also "wear" him around to give me a break. But as our son got bigger I really preferred a baby backpack (we purchased a Lillebaby).

title: Five Stars
author: Chenelle Valenzuela
comments: Great and the baby feels secure inside

title: This was my favorite wrap when my child was little
author: Alisha
comments: This was my favorite wrap when my child was little. It is so soft and easy on my body and the babies. I didn't feel pressure or pulling in one spot or uncomfortable at all. I always felt like I needed to still have my hand under my baby though. My child never fell though and I wrapped it just like the instructions say, but it just made me nervous, especially when moving. I used a different wrap if I was going to be moving a lot or needed both hands. I'm not sure what the instructions say, but I washed this, but did not dry it. It held up in the washer just fine.

title: Good but hot wrap
author: BG MOM
comments: The boba wrap is a very good carrier. My baby loved sleeping in it sometimes for hours at a time while I walk. The only thing I don't like is the fact that my back gets drenched of sweat, summer time almost impossible to wear, it gets so hot. Then I wore it in late fall and even on a cool winter day, ans still all the fabric that goes around my back makes me melt. Other than that it's a good wrap

title: My little guy is not one for personal space, ...
author: Meredith Hope
comments: My little guy is not one for personal space, so I slip him into this whenever we're out and about for the day.  An added bonus if you're a germaphobe, the wrap makes it a lot harder for strangers to touch baby vs if he was in a car seat.  It took me a few tries to master how to put it on, but now it's a breeze.  My next step is mastering breastfeeding in it before we fly cross country in  a few weeks.

title: Five Stars
author: K. Fletcher
comments: came super quick, exactly what the momma to be wanted! she loved it at her shower <3

title: Great for infants, but they get warm rather quick.
author: AT10
comments: Amazing product for infants, used it constantly. Only issue was how hot baby would get after half hour or so when completely snuggled.

title: Love It!
author: Andrew Rowe
comments: I love my Boba wrap! I wear it every chance I get! I put my daughter in it ever Sunday at church so I am not lugging around a car seat trying to chase my 3 year old and it helps keep people from touching her during cold and flu season, plus she tends to sleep through service too! It can be a little cumbersome at first but it is easy to get the hang of it after a few wears. I cant say enough how happy I am with this product, it allows me to run errands with 2 kids much easier and I recommend it to everyone!

title: Love/hate relationship
author: Morgan
comments: This wrap is pretty cool. I received it as a baby shower gift and it was something I had really wanted. It is a much more true purple than the photo. I was thinking it would be more eggplant. I like using this wrap and being able to go hands free but my baby is barely 8 pounds and it seems way too stretchy. I feel like I'm adjusting constantly and still feeling like she isn't completely safe. I have tried multiple ties but I just can't get it how I like. I love the idea of this wrap but it's not working out exactly right. I do love how soft it is and it's not terribly hot.

title: Five Stars
author: Lindsey N
comments: Love this wrap. I've never "worn" a baby before and this one worked perfectly.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: I love this product

title: 10/10; would recommend
author: PoopDollar
comments: This is seriously a must-have. I use it with my newborn all the time and it's amazing. I go on nightly walks with her and go shopping with it as well and she sleeps the entire time and looks so snuggled up and warm! She's an easy baby normally but I wouldn't be surprised if this would calm down a baby that gets a little fussy because it keeps them so comfy and allows mom or dad to get some errands done at the same time!

title: Very useful and love the material
author: HJen3
comments: Very useful and love the material.. i wish it stayed a little more secure because after a while of use it does start to droop.. I know being an AZ resident it's going to be very warm to use during the summer but definitely am glad I made the purchase!!

title: I prefer this to the K'tan wrap since the fit ...
author: K. Hewitt
comments: I prefer this to the K'tan wrap since the fit is totally customizable and you can tie it very tightly. It takes a little time to learn how to tie it, but once you get it down, it's not too complicated.The biggest downside is that the piece of fabric is incredibly long. So it drags the ground the whole time you are trying to tie it. I basically have to tie it before I leave the house and then leave it on the whole time I am out, even when baby is out of it.

title: Love the color and it's very easy on the back ...
author: angela alarid
comments: Love the color and it's very easy on the back when I carry the baby in it. Only thing is I need to figure out how to make sure her head is more secure when I am doing errands around the house because her head tends to lean back and not be very supportive without me holding it when I bend down, etc.

title: Wrapping it was easy, but my baby never liked being in this
author: Jackie Maven
comments: Wrapping it was easy, but my baby never liked being in this. Barely any use, and gave it to another mom who hopefully had better luck with it

title: Boba
author: Jess P.
comments: Love it, the Sangria colour is a bit lighter than the picture.

title: This thing is great. If you want to be hands-free but your ...
author: Michael Martin
comments: This thing is great. If you want to be hands-free but your baby wants to be held or near your body all the time, this is for you. However, make sure to take breaks from wearing it throughout the day, as your back will start hurting from carrying the baby.

title: Four Stars
author: MARIELA TORREZ
comments: the boba wrap was very useful for a short time of period holding your little one.

title: Baby papoose
author: Melissa D.
comments: I love this wrap-- the fabric is nice and soft and stretchy and it has clear instructions on how to put it on. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is the time it takes to put it on --- it takes a few minutes to get it on right and get your kiddo in there. Otherwise I love it.

title: Five Stars
author: Carolina Herdy
comments: Love it!

title: Five Stars
author: Becky Anglin
comments: Great

title: I absolutly love my Boba Baby Wrap
author: Sarah
comments: I absolutly love my Boba Baby Wrap! The only thing that could make it better is more head support for newborns

title: Definetly recommend to anyone else
author: sam barbosa
comments: Bought the boba wrap for my new little one. Was comparing it to the moby and decided to go for this after comparison. Same thing and a bit cheaper and works just as well. My little one absolutely loves it and falls asleep in it most of the time which is a big help. Well made material. Definetly recommend to anyone else!

title: Great for moms recovering from a c-section
author: Kayce Ekberg
comments: This baby wrap was god-send after my c-section!  I had another baby carrier I had planned on using after giving birth but was not able to because of my incision site.  I was able to use this wrap while I was still healing without any problems.  It does take longer to put on than my other baby carrier but my son loved being in it and I loved having my hands free again!

title: Great product!
author: Kristin
comments: I bought this as a baby shower gift and she absolutely loves how easy it is to use!Thank you for making such a great product!

title: Five Stars
author: Jennifer Hoover
comments: Love it!

title: Great wrap!
author: MT mama
comments: This is an absolutely wonderful wrap. Some wraps I had previously tried were pretty stiff but this one is soft and has a good amount of elasticity to comfortably carry my daughter. I've worn this wrap for a few hours at a time and never experienced any discomfort.

title: I like the wrap
author: Rachael
comments: I like the wrap, and more importantly, my baby boy likes it. However, the material is so lengthy that it's annoying to put on and take off. I get that it has to be long to accommodate different body types, but it is just too much fabric to fuss with.

title: It look/felt great!
author: Amazon Customer
comments: This was a gift. It look/felt great!

title: It's very comfortable and my baby loves it
author: Adrienne D.
comments: This wrap has been a lifesaver with a newborn and a toddler. It's very comfortable and my baby loves it!

title: Life saver
author: Kate E
comments: This wrap was a life saver. It was so worth the purchase. Anytime I put my baby in it he would fall asleep. He wasn't a big napper so this helped me out so much in the first three months. It keeps the baby so close and wrapped tightly(not too tight) to your body. It gives you your arms when your baby won't be put down.

title: Love it!!!!!
author: MaRaDi2010
comments: Love the boba wrap!!!!! Wish I could use longer than the recommended 5 months. Baby and momma like to hang while getting errands done.

title: Can't wait to use it with my newborn in May ...
author: mamaraymond
comments: Can't wait to use it with my newborn in May! My son is 13 months and is about 22 lbs and fits very well in the wrap so I'm looking forward to how comfy my second son will be. Been wanting one of these wraps since I first learned and read about them.

title: This worked okay for a couple weeks. I only ...
author: saki
comments: This worked okay for a couple weeks. I only used it from about week 3 to 5, even then I felt uncomfortable because baby was 7.5 lb and so tiny. The wrap seemed to big for her and it was a hassle to get her in and out of it, especially at that age when she needed a diaper change or feeding every half hour. It wasnt practical for such an age so I stashed it away. Now at 14 lb she is too big. According to instructions this is well within allowable weight to use the wrap but it is so stretchy that she slouches down. When I make it tight enough that she cant slouch, she gets uncomfortable and fusses. I am 5 ft 2, maybe that is an issue because I am small in proportion to my baby. But some people have said maybe it wasnt working for them because their baby was too big or too small. No, it just doesnt seem to work in general unless baby is going to be left in the wrap for a long period of time and you have the patience to wrap her /him up in a stretchy mess, AND your baby is totally proportional to your body as imagined by the design.

title: So uncomfortable!
author: Lorri
comments: It is NOT as easy as it looks on Youtube and in the product manual. Takes some practice. Just an FYI, if you are in Texas or another sounthern state where it gets pretty darn hot, you will be MISERABLE in this and so will your baby. I recommend something way lighter unless it is cool outside. I wish I had saved my money and gotten something else.

title: Wanted to love it!
author: Lindsey A. Morris
comments: I was really excited to try this and really wanted to like it. However it was much too hot for me and baby to wear around the house. Had to return it because my husband runs hot so I know neither of us will be able to use it.

title: Apparently great
author: Kindle Customer
comments: Bought this for my daughter.  She loves it.

title: Love It
author: Megan D. Mohler
comments: Great Product and Nice Quality.

title: great quality!
author: Rapid reader
comments: I wear this all the time, great quality!

title: Five Stars
author: richard kanayama
comments: Very good wrap

title: This wrap is fantastic for snuggles and to let me get around the ...
author: bec
comments: My little one is 6 days old and already loves to snuggle. This wrap is fantastic for snuggles and to let me get around the house!

title: Great wrap!
author: linnale
comments: Love love this wrap!  It's great when you have a fussy baby and need to do some things around the house.  I watched a you tube video on how to wrap for a newborn and that worked great so I would suggest that instead of going by the instructions as I actually didn't even use it for a while because that way just wasn't working for my 6lb baby.

title: Multitasking Mom
author: Megytron
comments: My son is 6 weeks old, and I just used this product for the first time today. I work full-time, but I have the luxury of taking my little one to work with me everyday. This wrap allows me to keep him snuggled in his favorite place (against my chest), while allowing me to go hands-free so that I can work efficiently. I no longer feel like I am confined to my desk chair! Can't wait to get home and do chores with him strapped in...I've never been excited about chores before. Interesting...

title: Good wrap
author: Amazon Customer
comments: This wrap works really well and I feel like baby is very secure once he's all wrapped up. My only issue is that it's a whole lot of fabric! I am very tiny at 5'1" and this can be cumbersome to get into, but once it's on it works very well and is very comfortable!

title: ... and I'm still not an expert but has worked pretty well for me
author: AO
comments: Took some time to figure out and I'm still not an expert but has worked pretty well for me. Tricky with s super squirmy abs big for age infant like mine... was more helpful when he was smaller

title: Love this. Very easy to put on
author: Jennifer
comments: Love this. Very easy to put on. Very soft fabric and comfortable. My baby insists on looking out and forward even though he is only 5 weeks and not much head control so i can only use it when he is sleeping. No fault of this company but it would be fantastic to have a way to use this so baby can look out

title: Mixed thoughts
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Easy and comfortable. I used around the house mostly.  If you wear in stores people act like your going to drop your kid (yes, I have it on correctly). They make it pretty awkward and irritating. Like I seriously had a woman rush to my car to put the groceries in and help get the baby in the car seat, it's that bad.

title: Perfect!!!
author: Brianna Olague
comments: Love this wrap! Always soothes my 2 month old and makes task easy since you have a variety of ways to place them in the wrap. Very handy when I go grocery shopping.

title: Life saver for my colicky baby!
author: reesy
comments: It's a must have baby carrier. Loved it so much I got another one!

title: Love my Boba Wraps!
author: Tracie Thomas
comments: I have way too many of these. I would always recommend!! Need to get chores done, go to baseball practice, grocery shopping..? Buy this!

title: Amazing!!
author: Amanda Lindsey
comments: This wrap is truly magical!! My 3 month old son loves being close to me. He is soothed and sleepy almost instantly!!

title: Super easy and is so comfortable to wear
author: Alisha
comments: My son loves the boba! Honestly it took me 2 tries to get the wrap down. Super easy and is so comfortable to wear. I haven't worn it in summer yet though my son was born in October.

title: Too stretchy
author: Megan Mullen
comments: We were given this and told it was fabulous, sadly it is unusable. We have watched the how to videos and tried multiple times but the material is too stretchy for an active baby. Our daughter is only 8 lbs and just keeps slipping down and down to the point that it is insafe. You shouldn't have to readjust/ retie every 15 minutes.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Love, love, love this wrap!  Super comfy and easy to use.  Perfect for a newborn.

title: got Moby organic instead
author: DenysM
comments: got Moby Organic instead for just 5 bucks more.

title: Amazing
author: RaeLynn
comments: First time using it (pictured):Amazing

title: All of the heart eyes for this product
author: Caroline
comments: Love. Love. Love. This wrap!!! Honestly I was quite intimidated by wrapping it and making sure my baby would be safe in it. After several uses I was a pro and I could finally get stuff done around the house. My newborn constantly wanted to be held! I love this thing! My baby loves it too and just falls right to sleep in it.

title: Lifesaver for a fussy baby
author: Jen
comments: This thing was a life saver for a crying baby.  Wrap her up in it and she would melt.  No more crying.  She is now 17lbs and I don't use it to carry her anymore because it causes too much strain on my back.  I do occasionally pull it out to swaddle her when she's inconsolable and it still works quite well.  I bought the Boba carrier to use for carrying her now.  Even though I had a much more limited time I could use the Boba wrap I would still buy it again.  It was a lifesaver in comforting her in a way that a regular carrier could not.

title: Great!
author: Ervell
comments: It's served its purpose nicely, it was perfect when my baby was newly born, it was the only way my wife would go outside the house, since my son needed to nurse every other hour. Now that he's a bit older we still use it to keep him warm when we go out in the cold.

title: Its a little hard to get it tight enough. ...
author: Lindsey Koepsel
comments: Its a little hard to get it tight enough. Taking a lot of practice but when I eventually get it I will be using more.

title: Only thing is Fabric is too long
author: Veronica
comments: I do love this wrap. I think the only thing I dislike about it is the fabric being too long! It takes me a while to put on just because of that. It is hard to keep it clean specially on those wet rainy days(and my car is too small to wrap I have to step out my car). It's fine when I have it on though.If you wear it too long baby and mommy will get hot so wouldn't recommend for HOT SUMMER DAYS. Perfect for winter though

title: Three Stars
author: Melissa <31985
comments: It's pretty! I just found it too confusing and too much material to deal with so I returned it.

title: Saved us!!
author: Brittanie
comments: This is the only way I get anything done with my sweet girl. The wrap is made of great material and the website provides instructions for use very clearly! Love it!

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Good item

title: Five Stars
author: dubia
comments: I love It!

title: Easy to do and feels very secure with baby
author: Elizabeth Ng
comments: Watch the Amazon video! Easy to do and feels very secure with baby. Stretchy and great material.

title: Five Stars
author: Mikhail Chirva
comments: deserves 6 stars...no - seven!!!!

title: Five Stars
author: Denee Lees
comments: Only issue is it's hard to get on in public places as it drags on the floor

title: Fabric is too thick
author: Amazon Customer
comments: The Boba is made out of a very thick, almost sweatshirt like, material that seems like it would quickly get way too hot for mama and baby. Also, because it is so thick, it made it very bulky and uncomfortable to wear. You need to be very careful not to get the thick material twisted at all when you tie it on, because then it gets very uncomfortable to have pressed into you. It also stretches and sags when you put baby into it so you need to tie it on tightly to the point that you feel constricted. I couldn't keep this thing on for more than 5 minutes and returned it and got a¬†Moby Wrap Bamboo Baby Carrier, Blush¬†instead. I HIGHLY recommend this thin Moby instead if you want to get a wrap. It is so much more comfortable.

title: My only complaint is that the "grey" looks more green ...
author: Mrs. F.
comments: My only complaint is that the "grey" looks more green than anything. I wish I would have ordered this in black. The

title: Great product!
author: Victoria
comments: I love the Boba wrap! I ordered one in black and it arrived very quickly. Not going to lie though, I almost wanted to return it after a few failed wrapping attempts. The material is very thick and there is a lot of it. I had a difficult time wrapping it around myself alone. You cannot twist it, all the fabric has to be smooth, neat and tight against your body. I had to have someone help wrap it around and help put my 2 week old son in. I practiced walking around the house a few times before i felt comfortable enough going out in public. I did a lot of adjusting the wrap and adjusting my son before it felt right. Definitely a product that will take some patience and practice for some. I highly recommend it though! Now that I got the hang of it, I go everywhere with my little one in it.

title: I love the Boba wrap so much I bought two of ...
author: Andrea M. Savar
comments: I love the Boba wrap so much I bought two of them! I was having a hard time with regular carriers because I broke my shoulder a month before my daughter was born. Any extra weight was too much and getting them on by myself was impossible with my limited motion (I had to wait until she was three months old to use it). The Boba was a complete game changer for me. My daughter LOVES being in it. It's so much lighter than other carriers. And best of all I can go about my day hands free while I work and she's happy as a clam. Also going shopping with the Boba is so much easier than with the stroller. I just recommend tying it when you get ready to leave the house instead of having to do it in the parking lot. Also my daughter takes epic naps while in it and it's easy to make sure her breathing is steady and unhindered. Highly recommended!

title: I only used this once, when you wash it ...
author: Karla
comments: I only used this once, when you wash it, it gets ugly, it also takes a little longer to put on compared to a normal baby carrier and my daughter use to get fussy by the time I tried to put it on

title: Love!
author: Semmy
comments: Great product! I like how this wrap is not too bulky on and you can throw on a cardigan and still be comfortable. I wish I got it when my baby was a newborn! I think we could have benefited greatly at that stage. But we still make good use of it. I like that I can wear it before leaving the house just in case she wants to be held. I've used it while traveling and we went through security without an issue. It is suggested to not wear the baby during the flight- take that suggestion! I didn't think I needed to take her out but when you're taking off, the pressure is a big deal and you can feel like you're compressing your baby. I took her out immediately. But she definitely feels secure in there and i have my hands free to handle bags, etc.

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
comments: Works really well for an undersized baby!!  She falls right asleep in it, even when collicky during the evenings.

title: Five Stars
author: Megz562
comments: I loved my boba!!!!!!!

title: Great wrap
author: Amazon Customer
comments: The material is soft and comfy. It breaths well, and I like that it doesn't make me a hot sweaty mess after wearing it. The directions were clear to understand how to put on the wrap, and the baby and I enjoy the snuggle factor.

title: Great but needs better instructions
author: lynda adams
comments: I love the fabric and how it feels but I'm giving it 4 stars bc it was WaY too hard for me to figure out from the diagrams. I spent days trying to find a video tutorial in my spare time of a colicky baby who just wanted to be held. We're good to go now!

title: Four Stars
author: Tina Marie Valdez
comments: I like it but it's just too warm for me & for baby

title: Five Stars
author: Melissa Poole
comments: Hands down the best purchase we've bought for our baby girl. Would buy 10 more if I could

title: Boba Baby Wrap, Orange
author: Carol M.
comments: I bought this for my daughter but she said the wrap was too warm.

title: Baby loves it
author: Krystle B
comments: Baby loveshower it. All snugly and warm. Was a gift and the parents said the baby has barely been out of it her first month

title: Love it
author: Tamara

title: I love this product

title: One Star
